# Customer Test Data Excel Template

## Instructions:
1. Open this file in Excel
2. First row is HEADER (do not change)
3. Add test data from row 2 onwards
4. Save as customer.xlsx

## Excel Structure (12 columns):

| Company | VatNumber | Phone | Website | Group | Address | City | State | ZipCode | Currency | Language | Country |
|---------|-----------|-------|---------|-------|---------|------|-------|---------|----------|----------|---------|
| ABC Technology Company | 123456789 | 0939200600 | https://abctech.com | VIP | 123 Nguyen Hue Street, District 1 | Ho Chi Minh | Ho Chi Minh | 700000 | USD | Vietnamese | Vietnam |
| XYZ Corporation | 987654321 | 0912345678 | https://xyz.com | Gold | 456 Le Loi Street | Ha Noi | Ha Noi | 100000 | VND | English | Vietnam |

## Notes:
- Save as .xlsx format
- Do not use special characters in file name
- Place file in: src/test/resources/testdata/customer.xlsx
